org.jerkar.api.depmanagement
Class JkRepo

java.lang.Object
  org.jerkar.api.depmanagement.JkRepo
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
JkRepo.JkIvyRepository, JkRepo.JkMavenRepository
public abstract class JkRepo
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

An abstract repository that can be either a Maven nor an Ivy repository.

See Also:

of

public static JkRepo of(java.lang.String url)
Returns a repository having the specified url. If the repository is an Ivy repository than the url should start with ivy: as ivy:http://myrepolocation.
